features: [Ample Storage] Keep your sofa side or bedside tidy and convenient with this side table. It boasts a handy tabletop to hold your glasses or a cup of tea for easy access, and 2 fabric drawers to tuck away unsightly odds and ends for a neat appearance

[Sturdy & Stable] This nightstand with drawers, constructed from high-quality steel and particleboard and balanced by four adjustable feet, effortlessly holds up to 120 lb, ensuring stable and reliable support for your items
[Hassle-Free Assembly] No need for assembly stress! With easy-to-read instructions and marked components provided, you'll have this nightstand assembled and ready for use in no time

[Versatile Uses] This elegant table is a stylish and functional addition to any space in your home, whether it's serving as a side table in your living room, a convenient bedside table in your bedroom, or a compact table in your study

[Thoughtful Details] The elevated legs of this nightstand make cleaning underneath effortless. Additionally, the 2 cord management holes at the back of the table ensure a neat and organized look by tucking away your cords

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rotating Plastic Stoppers Prevent drawers from accidentally coming out of the end table and facilitate easy drawer removal when rotated properly. Quality Panels Premium veneered particleboard makes this side table sturdy, stable, water-resistant, and easy to clean. Adjustable Feet Help the nightstand maintain stability on slightly uneven floors. Easy Cleaning Underneath Thanks to the tall legs of this nightstand, maintaining cleanliness underneath is a breeze.

Specifications: Color: Cloud White, Dove GrayMaterial: Particleboard, Steel, Non-Woven FabricProduct Size: 11.8"D x 15.7"W x 21.7"H (30 x 40 x 55 cm)Product Weight: 14.8 lb (6.7 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity of the Tabletop: 100 lb (45.5 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity of Each Drawer: 10 lb (4.5 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity Total: 120 lb (54.5 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Nightstand1 x Accessory Kit1 x Instructions VASAGLE Notes: Do not put overweight items in the drawers.Do not wash the drawer. Clean with a wet cloth.There may be a smell of "new" when first opening the package; please air the end table out in a well-ventilated place for a few hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little difficult to but together, but worth it!
reviews.reviewText: Great, just what I wanted for the time and money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish. Excellent budget nightstand. Looks better in person than the photos (IMO).
reviews.reviewText: You're getting what you see in the description. It's not an heirloom piece of furniture that's going to last 200 years. But it's priced accordingly. And it looks good. Everything about it meets expectations. So no stars will be deducted for build quality. It's fine and as expected.I actually think it looks a little better in person than the pictures. For some reason the proportions of the bottom stand looked off to me in the photos. I really liked the drawer part, but was considering not even installing the bottom brackets. But now that I have it, I think the bottom part looks good. And the balance looks right. I don't know why it looks a bit off to me in the photos.The little plastic hooks do a good job at preventing the drawers from sliding out. So they’re not going to pull out unless you really pull hard and are trying to pull them out.I think the assembly is fairly easy. It's a bit time consuming because of all the screws and pegs, but each individual step is simple. The directions are also good. It's all pictures. Which is the proper way to do it IMO. Written directions just get destroyed by the machine translator and you're left with non-sense that confuses more than helps. TIP: Just align every piece in the same orientation as the photo, and do the step they're showing you. When you do this, these type of directions are SO simple. Time consuming, but simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Looks Great
reviews.reviewText: This is an attractive end table with two fabric drawers. The drawers offer plenty of storage space. I was surprised how much they hold and also how strong they are. I have one nearly filled with odds and ends, and it’s not bowing or bending at all. It’s durable, and it’s also very easy to assemble. I’m using mine as a nightstand and couldn’t be happier with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this nightstand for my daughter to have in her room, she put it together herself and it didn't take that long for her to do it; it wasn't that big and it fit nicely in the corner in her room. I recommend this product for anyone looking to add a nice size nightstand to their room or child's room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nicely Made, but Tiny
reviews.reviewText: This was a nice addition to the bedroom set. It was super easy to put together, although I did have to use a rubber mallet at times. It came out sturdy and leveled nicely. It was a bit smaller than I had expected it to be. I know one of the pictures shows the measurements, but it still looks super small. I used a pack of cards to help reference that. Still, it does hold s decent amount of things, including on top.I don't know that the price is what I would want to pay for something like this, it is nice, but not that nice. Even so, if the price isn't bothersome to you then this is a nice little addition for any room. May even be perfect for a young kids room as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A 10 star side table
reviews.reviewText: Don’t have much money? This side table is inexpensive, looks trendy and has a nice amount of drawer space. The drawers are soft but if you don’t constantly throw stuff in them they should last for a good amount of time perfect for teens and college students too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This nightstand was easy to assemble and is sturdy. It holds a decent amount of stuff in the drawers. It’s nice looking too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. More sturdy than you would think
couldn't ask for better night stands for that price!!
